overview: “Every man is surrounded by a neighborhood of voluntary spies.”” – George Washington  Spying has always claimed the highest position in the hierarchy of human behavior. And thus it forms the crux of the film ‘Nino Live’. Based in the modern age, the film shows how an entire life can go public in this era of wires and networks.  The film revolves around the journey of a child from adolescence to early manhood, all caught on celluloid.
title: Nino Live
